name: Python
description: My primary backend language. Versatile, powerful, and perfect for everything from web APIs to data processing and automation scripts.

name: TypeScript
description: JavaScript with superpowers. Type safety makes building complex frontend applications much more maintainable and less error-prone.

name: Django
description: The web framework for perfectionists with deadlines. Batteries-included approach means I can focus on building features, not boilerplate.

name: React
description: My go-to library for building interactive UIs. Component-based architecture makes code reusable and maintainable at scale.

name: Astro
description: The modern static site builder. Ships zero JS by default for blazing-fast performance. This site is built with Astro!

name: Next.js
description: The React framework for production. Server-side rendering, static generation, and excellent developer experience out of the box.

name: Tailwind CSS
description: Utility-first CSS framework that speeds up development. No more context switching between files - style directly in your markup.

name: PostgreSQL
description: My database of choice. Robust, reliable, and feature-rich. Handles everything from simple queries to complex data relationships.

name: Docker
description: Containerization made simple. Ensures my applications run consistently across development, testing, and production environments.

name: Git
description: Version control is non-negotiable. Git keeps my code history organized and enables seamless collaboration with teams.
